entry.title: Secret Keepers
entry.summary:
Author: PeanutWWW

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 53,638Chapters: 23/?Kudos: 1,388

Summary: Peter Parker Grayson has always felt left out from his family like he didn’t know something everybody else was in on. Until he got a secret of his own being spider-man you’ll notice lots of references to other spider-man movies!
